pages.text: Mine this block to obtain $(l:ghost/items/necrom_ghost_eyecon)Ghost Eyecons$(/l)$(br2)Requires an iron pickaxe or better$(br2)Drops:$(li)$(l:ghost/items/blank_ghost_eyecon)Blank Ghost Eyecon$(/l) (32.1%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/necrom_ghost_eyecon)Necrom Ghost Eyecon$(/l) (16%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/dark_ghost_eyecon)Dark Ghost Eyecon$(/l) (5.3%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/dark_necrom_pink_ghost_eyecon)Dark Necrom Ghost Eyecon (Pink)$(/l) (5.3%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/dark_necrom_red_ghost_eyecon)Dark Necrom Ghost Eyecon (Red)$(/l) (5.3%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/dark_necrom_blue_ghost_eyecon)Dark Necrom Ghost Eyecon (Blue)$(/l) (5.3%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/dark_necrom_yellow_ghost_eyecon)Dark Necrom Ghost Eyecon (Yellow)$(/l) (5.3%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/zero_specter_ghost_eyecon)Zero Specter Ghost Eyecon$(/l) (5.3%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/santa_ghost_eyecon)Santa Ghost Eyecon$(/l) (1.1%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/yujou_burst_ghost_eyecon)Yujou Burst Ghost Eyecon$(/l) (1.1%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/sin_specter_ghost_eyecon)Sin Specter Ghost Eyecon$(/l) (1.1%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/tenkatoitsu_ghost_eyecon)Tenkatoitsu Ghost Eyecon$(/l) (3.2%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/shinsengumi_ghost_eyecon)Shinsengumi Ghost Eyecon$(/l) (3.2%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/special_ore_ghost_eyecon)Special Ore Ghost Eyecon$(/l) (3.2%)
